channel.title: PI Client crash help :x
channel.description:
I get this error upon login
[QUOTE]RS2 user client - release #317 Map Amount: 1226 602 Animations Amount: 13799 530 Overlay Floors amount: 185 634 Items Amount: 20085 602 NPCs Amount: 11257 602 GFX Amount: 2617 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5530 at EntityDef.method161(EntityDef.java:81) at Client.drawMinimap(Client.java:11171) at Client.drawGameScreen(Client.java:9277) at Client.processDrawing(Client.java:10150) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:178) at Client.run(Client.java:5147) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/QUOTE]

item.title: PI Client crash help :x
item.dc:creator: @loruviam loruviam
item.description:
@loruviam wrote:

I get this error upon login

[QUOTE]RS2 user client - release #317
Map Amount: 1226
602 Animations Amount: 13799
530 Overlay Floors amount: 185
634 Items Amount: 20085
602 NPCs Amount: 11257
602 GFX Amount: 2617
Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5530
at EntityDef.method161(EntityDef.java:81)
at Client.drawMinimap(Client.java:11171)
at Client.drawGameScreen(Client.java:9277)
at Client.processDrawing(Client.java:10150)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:178)
at Client.run(Client.java:5147)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/QUOTE]
